articles.title: First Colombian with non-terminal illness dies legally by euthanasia - Reuters
articles.description: Colombian Victor Escobar became the first person in the Andean country with a non-terminal illness to die by legally regulated euthanasia late on Friday, his lawyer Luis Giraldo confirmed.
articles.content: BOGOTA, Jan 8 (Reuters) - Colombian Victor Escobar became the first person in the Andean country with a non-terminal illness to die by legally regulated euthanasia late on Friday, his lawyer Luis Gir… [+2004 chars]

articles.title: Driver dies after being trapped in burning rental car following carpark crash - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A driver died while trapped in a rented car that caught fire after a collision in a carpark on Friday (Jan 7). The collision occurred in the open carpark at Block 42 Cassia Crescent, next to the Geylang Police Post. A resident of the block, who ga…

articles.title: Li Jinglei hit by backlash in Wang Leehom saga; good friend Patty Hou becomes unexpected target - AsiaOne
articles.description: If you thought 2021 marked the end of the Wang Leehom-Li Jinglei divorce saga, think again. Only this time, the tide appears to have turned — in Leehom's favour. According to Taiwan media reports, the "whitewashing" of the Mandopop singer's misdeeds in recent…
articles.content:
